svg.title: getIntersectionList() with <use>
svg.script: function getMatchingLocalNames(x, y) { const svg = document.documentElement; const rect = Object.assign(svg.createSVGRect(), {x, y, width: 1, height: 1}); const elems = svg.getIntersectionList(rect, null); return Array.from(elems).map(e => e.localName).sort(); } test(t => { assert_array_equals(getMatchingLocalNames(50, 60), ['circle', 'use']); assert_array_equals(getMatchingLocalNames(0, 0), []); });
